estebang23.github.io

strip-eof

Strip the End-Of-File (EOF) character from a string/buffer

Install

$ npm install --save strip-eof

Usage

const stripEof = require('strip-eof');

stripEof('foo\nbar\n\n');
//=> 'foo\nbar\n'

stripEof(new Buffer('foo\nbar\n\n')).toString();
//=> 'foo\nbar\n'
